thread.title: Obama calls for less standardized testing in schools, addressing nationwide concerns
thread.title_full: Obama calls for less standardized testing in schools, addressing nationwide concerns - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Obama calls for less standardized testing in schools, addressing nationwide concerns
text: President Obama on Saturday called for limiting the amount of standardizes educational testing to 2 percent of classroom time, addressing the growing concern across the county about an over emphasis on test taking. ...
